data.text:
‚è±Data delivery, faster.

Today, we reduced the latency for all v2 streaming endpoints by half, which includes the filtered and sampled stream endpoints.

New Yorkers! Join @i_am_daniele & @jessicagarson at the Twitter New York Office on Thursday, June 30 at 6pm. Let's connect and discuss what's new on the Developer Platform.üöÄ

RSVP ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/I77AEs0ute https://t.co/lWvNycErWl

When a client tasked @RedCloudFS to raise awareness about new patent-pending technology, they turned to @AudienseCo to build, segment, and target new audiences based on Twitter data. üìäüöÄ

Read more ‚¨áÔ∏è
https://t.co/DbX3Exqn5i
Thank you for sharing this issue and for continuing to help us make the platform better.

We plan to deliver up to 3,200 Tweets created in the last 7 days, which we expect to solve for most use cases. We‚Äôll also continue to deliver the most recent 800 Tweets regardless of creation date. We intend for this to be available soon and will share updates.

Thank you to our dev community for reporting that the reverse chronological timeline v2 endpoint is only returning the most recent 800 Tweets rather than 3,200 Tweets, as we‚Äôd documented. We‚Äôre working hard on a solution and we‚Äôre sorry for this oversight. More in thread üëá

Jerry Yang, one of @taaforg‚Äôs founding board members, joined us to talk about his life experience that led him to start TAAF and create the Decoding Hate project in this premiere article of the Global Scope series. Read the interview here. #IAmATwitterDev
https://t.co/6XjDE6RkOH https://t.co/xT5LjUuRxJ

Using the Twitter API v2 search Tweets and Tweets lookup endpoints, the team turned thousands of Tweets into insightful stories. Learn more about the technical aspects of Decoding Hate and the impact it's had.\xa0
https://t.co/EHp3AnNZ7N https://t.co/dvcr561Q1X

Go Behind the Code with @taaforg to see how and why they used the Twitter Dev Platform to access data, track online bias, and raise awareness to help stop hate crimes in the #AAPI community. #BuildWhatsNext
Watch the video üé•
https://t.co/VCPgVZid3N

In honor of Asian Americans and Pacific Islander (AAPI) Heritage month, we are spotlighting Decoding Hate, a project built with the Twitter Dev platform by @taaforg and @stopaapihate to track online bias and hate crimes in the #AAPI community.

https://t.co/wkpz66lmxR https://t.co/B3aR19kuTu

üì¢  All developers can now Tweet videos, GIFs, images, alt text, and subtitles with the v1.1 media endpoints. 

We‚Äôre adding this v1.1 functionality while we continue to work to deliver the v2 media endpoints.\xa0‚öôÔ∏è

Learn more üëá 
https://t.co/7OUrCqqcSb

The time(line) has finally come! The reverse-chronological home timeline is now available on the Twitter API v2, allowing you to retrieve the most recent Tweets and Retweets from people you follow.

Check out the forum post for more informationüëá
https://t.co/JaaguOjtvl

Today marks the launch of Devs in the Details, a technical video series made for developers by developers building with the Twitter API.\xa0\xa0üöÄ

In this premiere episode, @jessicagarson walks us through how she built @FactualCat #WelcomeToOurTechTalk
